Great game, watched some former pros when I was little boy and played xbox and roblox. Unfortunately I've been VAC Banned for cheating, not on my main. Linked Steam Guard to a alt account under the same email/phone # as my main. Resulting in VAC Ban. It's fine though I sold my items before the VAC Ban thanks to the sale that waas going on at the time, and now I'm not that into CS as much as I was before the VAC ban. Good game though.
